document.title: Announcing Our Website Redesign
document.description: Explore our updated site information and live demo access.

body.raw:
# Announcing Our Website Redesign

We’ve refreshed our website to make it easier than ever to find up-to-date information about ArticleIP’s features, plans, and support resources.

---

## Updated Information

- **Feature Overviews:** Now clearly described in one place  
- **Pricing & Plans:** Streamlined comparison table for quick decision‑making  
- **Resources:** Centralized links to docs, case studies, and support  

---

## Live Demo Access

The demo is now available directly on the site. Simply click **Request Demo** in the header and start exploring ArticleIP immediately—no wait necessary.

---

*Published July 18, 2025*
